titleStmt.title: To all Arch-Bishops, and Bishops, who are not a shame (to) or ashamed (of) the name of Christ before men, grace, wisdom and truth, from God our Father, and from our Lord Jesus Christ, amen.
titleStmt.author: Chamberlen, Peter, 1601-1683.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
